column3: When your wheelhouse is the land of cotton
column4: The first time you leave it can be strange,, it can be shocking
column5: Not everybody drives a truck,, not everybody drinks sweet tea
column6: Not everybody owns a gun,, wears a ball cap,, boots,, and jeans
column7: Not everybody goes to church,, or watches every NASCAR race
column8: Not everybody knows the words to Ring Of Fire or Amazing Grace
column13: When I miss my Tennessee home
column14: And I've been away way too long
column15: I can't see this world unless I go
column19: I have walked the streets of Rome,, I have been to foreign lands
column20: I know what it's like to talk and have nobody understand
column21: I have seen the Eiffel Tower lit up on a Paris night
column22: I have kissed a West Coast girl underneath the Northern Lights
column23: I know what it's like to be the only one like me
column24: To take a good hard look around and be a minority
column27: And I miss my Tennessee home
column28: I can see the ways that I've grown
column29: I can't see this world unless I go
column33: I miss your biscuits and your gravy
column35: You have fed me,, you have saved me
column37: I have since become a drifter
column38: And I just can't wait to pack
column39: Cause I know the route I leave on
column40: It will always bring me back
column45: I wish I was in Dixie Again
column47: I've been away way too long
column48: I can't see this world unless I go
column54: I wish I was in Dixie,, away,, look away
